verses.verse: Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he is good, <S%H2896><s%> for his loving kindness <S%H2896><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> now say <S%H559><s%> that his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Let the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> now say <S%H559><s%> that his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Now let those who fear <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> say <S%H559><s%> that his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Out of my distress, <S%H4712><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> on Yah. <S%H3050><s%> Yah <S%H3050><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me with freedom. <S%H4800><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is on my side. <S%H3372><s%> I will not be afraid. What can <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> do to me? <S%H6213><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is on my side among those who help <S%H5826><s%> me. <S%H7200><s%> Therefore I will look in triumph at those who hate me. <S%H8130><s%>
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> than to put confidence <S%H982><s%> in man. <S%H120><s%>
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> than to put confidence <S%H982><s%> in princes. <S%H5081><s%>
All the nations <S%H1471><s%> surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me, <S%H8034><s%> but in the name of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> I cut them off. <S%H4135><s%>
They surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me, <S%H5437><s%> yes, they surrounded me. <S%H8034><s%> In the name of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> I indeed cut them off. <S%H4135><s%>

They surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me like bees. <S%H1682><s%> They are quenched <S%H1846><s%> like the burning <S%H784><s%> thorns. <S%H6975><s%> In the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> I cut them off. <S%H4135><s%>
You pushed <S%H1760><s%> me back hard, <S%H1760><s%> to make me fall, <S%H5307><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> helped me. <S%H5826><s%>
Yah <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song. <S%H2176><s%> He has become my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of rejoicing <S%H7440><s%> and salvation <S%H3444><s%> is in the tents <S%H168><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%> "The right hand <S%H3225><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> valiantly. <S%H2428><s%>
The right hand <S%H3225><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is exalted! <S%H7426><s%> The right hand <S%H3225><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> valiantly! <S%H2428><s%>"
I will not die, <S%H4191><s%> but live, <S%H2421><s%> and declare <S%H5608><s%> Yah <S%H3050><s%>'s works. <S%H4639><s%>
Yah <S%H3050><s%> has punished <S%H3256><s%> me severely, <S%H3256><s%> but he has not given me over <S%H5414><s%> to death. <S%H4194><s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> to me the gates <S%H8179><s%> of righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> I will enter <S%H935><s%> into them. <S%H3034><s%> I will give thanks to Yah. <S%H3050><s%>
This is the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will enter into it. <S%H935><s%>
I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, <S%H6030><s%> for you have answered me, <S%H3444><s%> and have become my salvation.
The stone <S%H68><s%> which the builders <S%H1129><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> has become the head <S%H7218><s%> of the corner. <S%H6438><s%>
This is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s doing. <S%H6381><s%> It is marvelous in our eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
This is the day <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has made. <S%H6213><s%> We will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and be glad in it! <S%H8055><s%>
Save <S%H3467><s%> us now, <S%H577><s%> we beg you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh! Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> we beg <S%H577><s%> you, <S%H6743><s%> send prosperity now.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> is he who comes <S%H935><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> We have blessed <S%H1288><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is God, <S%H410><s%> and he has given us light. <S%H215><s%> Bind <S%H631><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> with cords, <S%H5688><s%> even to the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
You are my God, <S%H410><s%> and I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you. <S%H430><s%> You are my God, I will exalt you. <S%H7311><s%>
Oh give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he is good, <S%H2896><s%> for his loving kindness <S%H2896><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%>
